function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased negative perception of bird songs in urban areas due to reduced ambient noise levels during lockdown","Impact":"Negative impact on mental well-being and overall quality of life","Mitigation":"Promote awareness of the positive benefits of bird song in urban areas and provide information on how to cope with increased noise sensitivity","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, noise-cancelling headphones, soundproofing solutions","People":"Urban residents, individuals working from home","Owner":"Local authorities, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Construction noise becoming more dominant in the urban environment during lockdown","Impact":"Increased annoyance and disruption for urban residents","Mitigation":"Implement stricter noise regulations for construction sites, promote use of quieter construction equipment, and provide support for soundproofing of homes","Technologies":"Quieter construction machinery, soundproofing technology, noise monitoring systems","People":"Urban residents, construction workers","Owner":"Local authorities, construction companies"},{"Description":"Changes in attitudes towards outdoor noise levels during lockdown","Impact":"Shift in perception of outdoor noise and its impact on mental well-being","Mitigation":"Provide information on coping strategies for increased noise sensitivity and promote community engagement in noise reduction efforts","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, noise monitoring apps, mental health support resources","People":"Urban residents, individuals affected by increased noise sensitivity","Owner":"Local authorities, mental health organizations"}]}
